text: Kristen Bell gushes praise in the most heartfelt and funny way Saturday in tribute to her husband Dax Shepard, who is celebrating his “ 14th year sobriety birthday. ” “ I will forever be in awe of your dedication, and the level of fierce moral inventory you perform on yourself, like an emotional surgery, every single night, ” the “ Good Place ” star wrote in a touching Instagram post to her husband of nearly eight years.
